author: Animalogic
description:
Visit https://mdsh.io/animalogic and use our promo code ANIMALOGIC10 for 10% off only until 5th of October to start your journey with The Book.

-----------
This is the tiniest deer in the world, the pudu. His small size doesn't make it a pushover. This little guy has thrived for millennia in a land of mighty predators. How does it do it? This are the secrets of the little pudu.

00:48 Why the Pudu is So Unique
01:33 Two Species of Pudu
02:47 Ancient Species and Gondwana Relics
04:48 Pudu Populations and Isolation
05:32 Searching for Pudus in Chiloé
08:28 First Wild Pudu Encounter
08:53 Mama and Baby Pudu Sighting
13:25 Diseases Threatening Pudus
14:35 Population Decline and Extinction Risk
15:24 Conservation needs – Habitat and Protection

-----------
Special thanks to our friends in Chile helping us learn more about the pudu. Follow them to learn more about this amazing animal.
Alexis Riquelme Ivusic - CRCPUDU - https://www.instagram.com/crcpudu
Victor Moya Velasquez - https://www.i
title: The Pudu: Meet The World's Smallest Deer
